The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 February is 3,556,039 (6,317.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 February, there were 83,769 new confirmed cases (148.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 February, there were 119,948 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (36,179 fewer cases).
